sourcesContent:
<template>
   <ag-charts-vue :options="options"></ag-charts-vue>
</template>

<script>
import { AgChartsVue } from 'ag-charts-vue3';
export default {
  props: {
    event: {
      type: Object,
      default() {
        return{}
      }
    }
  },
  components: {
    'ag-charts-vue': AgChartsVue,
  },
  data: function () {
    return {
      options: null,
    };
  },

  methods: {
    createChart() {
      let vm = this;
      console.log(vm.event)
      this.options = {
      data: [
      { label: 'Android', value: 56.9 },
      { label: 'iOS', value: 22.5 },
      ],
      series: [
        {
          type: 'pie',
          angleKey: 'value',
          calloutLabelKey: 'label',
          sectorLabelKey: 'value',
          sectorLabel: {
            color: 'white',
            fontWeight: 'bold',
          },
        },
      ],
    };
    }
  },

  beforeMount() {
   this.createChart()
  },
}
</script>

<style>

</style>
